titles.title: To Him Who Sits On The Throne

properties.copyright: 1984 Integrity's Hosanna! Music, Administered by Integrity Music, Inc.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
To Him who sits on the throne,
And unto the Lamb,
To Him who sits on the throne,
And unto the Lamb,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be blessing and honor
And glory and power forever,
Be blessing and honor
And glory and power forever.
